GPUImageGaussianBlurPositionFilter Class Reference

Inherits from GPUImageTwoPassTextureSamplingFilter : GPUImageTwoPassFilter : GPUImageFilter : GPUImageOutput : NSObject

Overview

A more generalized 9x9 Gaussian blur filter

blurCenter

Center for the blur, defaults to 0.5, 0.5

blurSize

A multiplier for the blur size, ranging from 0.0 on up, with a default of 1.0
